code:
%%{Retail_CouponSystem}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (Retail_CouponSystem)

[Retail_CouponSystem] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (Retail_Inventory)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (Retail_CouponSystem)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (Retail_Inventory)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (Retail_Inventory)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (Retail_PointOfSale)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (Retail_OrderManagement)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (Retail_PointOfSale)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (Retail_Inventory)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Retail_CouponSystem)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (Retail_OrderManagement)

%% Appeals (Retail_OrderManagement)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Retail_CouponSystem)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Retail_Inventory)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [Retail_OrderManagement]
ARCHIVED --> [Retail_CouponSystem]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_CustomerLoyalty 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_CustomerLoyalty'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Retail_Inventory 和 Retail_CouponSystem。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Retail_Inventory 和 Retail_CouponSystem'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 Retail_Inventory 和 Retail_Inventory 的逻辑。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Retail_Inventory 和 Retail_Inventory'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_OrderManagement 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_OrderManagement'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_Inventory。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Retail_PointOfSale 和 Retail_Inventory'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_OrderManagement 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_CouponSystem 和 Retail_OrderManagement'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 Retail_OrderManagement 和 Retail_CouponSystem 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Retail_OrderManagement 和 Retail_CouponSystem'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Retail_CustomerLoyalty 和 Retail_Inventory 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Retail_CustomerLoyalty 和 Retail_Inventory'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
